price: Hakika tumewajaribu hawa kama tulivyo wajaribu wale wenye shamba, walipo apa kwamba watayavuna mazao yake itakapo kuwa asubuhi.
arabic: إِنَّا بَلَوۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ إِذۡ أَقۡسَمُواْ لَيَصۡرِمُنَّهَا مُصۡبِحِينَ
footnotes: Sisi tumewafanyia mtihani watu wa Makka kwa kuwapa neema, nao wakazikufuru; kama tulivyo wafanyia mtihani hao watu wenye shamba, walipo chukua kiapo kuwa watakwenda vuna mazao ya shamba lao asubuhi mapema,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā balawnāhum kamā balawnā aṣḥāba al-janati idh aqsamū layaṣrimunnahā muṣ'biḥīna
